GSD.description:
dm raid: fix address sanitizer warning in raid_status

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.291 by commit 90b006da40dd42285b24dd3c940d2c32aca9a70b. For more details please see the references link.
